variable.name: CONSENT
variable.description: Consent group as determined by DAC

variable.name: AFFECTION_STATUS
variable.description: Case control status of the subject (Controls - subjects without fever: 1=Control, 4=Snapshot and 5=Tx_fu; Cases - subjects with fever: 2=Case 3=Positive Control and 6=Fever_fu; 7=Other [neither case/control])
